text: "Mad as Rabbits" was the last song ever recorded while Ryan Ross and Jon Walker were still members of Panic! at the Disco. The song is from the band's second studio album, Pretty. Odd. The quote "(We must) Reinvent Love" (or "Reinventâ™¥") is the last line sung on the album by Urie and Ross together. Category:2008 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Panic! at the Disco songs
title: Mad as Rabbits
